importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The article was updated on this date, indicating the announcement of the new Netflix series.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The series begins in the 1930s, tracing the rise of the Kennedy family, particularly Joe and Rose Kennedy and their children, including Jack Kennedy.

keyTakeAways: Netflix has announced a new drama series titled 'Kennedy' based on Fredrik Logevall’s book 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956.'
The series stars Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr., and explores the triumphs and tragedies of the Kennedy family across generations.
The show begins in the 1930s and chronicles the rise of Joe and Rose Kennedy and their nine children, including Jack, who struggles to escape his brother's shadow.
The series is described as having 'American mythology' qualities, blending historical depth with personal human struggles.
The showrunner Sam Shaw emphasizes that the Kennedy story reveals insights into how the United States evolved and where it may be headed.
The series is distinct from Ryan Murphy’s upcoming 'American Love Story,' which focuses on JFK Jr.
The series will run for eight episodes and does not yet have an official release date.

namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Founder of the Kennedy political dynasty
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is portrayed as the patriarch in the series, establishing the family’s foundation in the 1930s.

namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: Jack is a central character in the narrative, struggling against his brother’s shadow and symbolizing the family’s political legacy.

namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Son of President John F. Kennedy, who died in a plane crash in 1999
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His death is mentioned as part of the Kennedy family’s tragic history, reinforcing the theme of family tragedy.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Netflix has announced a new historical drama series titled 'Kennedy,' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography, which stars Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr. The series begins in the 1930s, tracing the rise and struggles of the Kennedy family, including Jack Kennedy’s journey to escape his brother’s shadow. The show explores both the triumphs and tragedies of the family, drawing parallels to American mythology and societal evolution. It is distinct from Ryan Murphy’s upcoming 'American Love Story' and will consist of eight episodes with no release date yet set.
title: Netflix Announces New Kennedy Family Series Starring Michael Fassbender
